name: The Quest of the Time Machine
name_original: The Quest of the Time Machine
description:
The source code for my game: https://github.com/dave8898/miniature-sniffle

This is and adventure game in which a person was lost in a time machine that broke after an experiment with it and the player is having to reassemble it if they want to person lost in the time machine back in the present wants to make it back to the present and not be stuck in a different Era forever
